attributes.action: Allow self employed pregant women more help with financial aid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow self employed pregnant women more help with financial aid.  We do not get holiday/sick pay throughout employment. We pay our taxes and national insurance contributions and get very little in return for our efforts. some of us do not have husbands/partners with magificent wages either.  We need proper advice lines and up to date infomation on the direct.gov website. We do not need conflicting information on what we are entitled to and what not.  The CAB help is poor as well.
